global_attributes.comment: Deployment summary: This glider was deployed to the Frontal Zone 1 (FZ-1) line 2020-06-13T21:30:56 UTC and recovered 2020-08-19T21:26:00 UTC. The DVL was disabled 2020-07-19 to conserve battery power for recovery. The science computer experienced logging issues during this deployment and would periodically go out of service resulting in dives without any science data.

platform.long_name: OOI Coastal Pioneer 1000m Slocum Glider cp_514
